L

login(String, String, ClientType) - Method in class businessLogic.AdminFacade
Login to the system as an admin, check the name and the password
login(String, String, ClientType) - Method in class businessLogic.CompanyFacade
Login to the system as a company, search name and password in the table Company - Can't login to the system if the system shut down
login(String, String, ClientType) - Method in interface businessLogic.CouponClientFacade
Login to the system by client type, search name and password where needed
login(String, String, ClientType) - Method in class businessLogic.CustomerFacade
Login to the system as a customer, search name and password in the table Customer - Can't login to the system if the system shut down

Factory - login to the system by client type
